SEARCH
Module com.example.gamevoice
Package main

Class MainLogic

java.lang.Object
main.MainLogic
public class MainLogic extends Object
The MainLogic class represents the core logic of the application, managing user registration, authentication, voting, file operations, and notifying observers of events.
